languages.text: "Мне больно это говорить, но вам должно было пойти на пользу посещение Тассеры. Подобное сильно... расширяет кругозор".

traits.locale_text: "Мне больно это говорить, но вам должно было пойти на пользу посещение Тассеры. Подобное сильно... расширяет кругозор".

languages.text: "It pains me to say this, but I believe visiting Thassera was beneficial for you. Such experiences... greatly expand one's horizons."
languages.original_text: "Мне больно это говорить, но вам должно было пойти на пользу посещение Тассеры. Подобное сильно... расширяет кругозор".

traits.locale_text: "It pains me to say this, but I believe visiting Thassera was beneficial for you. Such experiences... greatly expand one's horizons."

"It pains me to say this, but I believe visiting Thassera was beneficial for you. Such experiences... greatly expand one's horizons."

languages.text: 「こんなことを言うのは心苦しいのですが、タッセーラを訪れたのはあなたにとって有益だったと思います。あのような経験は…視野を大きく広げてくれますから」
languages.original_text: "It pains me to say this, but I believe visiting Thassera was beneficial for you. Such experiences... greatly expand one's horizons."

traits.locale_text: 「こんなことを言うのは心苦しいのですが、タッセーラを訪れたのはあなたにとって有益だったと思います。あのような経験は…視野を大きく広げてくれますから」

languages.text: "Es schmerzt mich, das zu sagen, doch ich glaube, der Besuch auf Thassera war gut für Euch. Solche Erfahrungen ... erweitern den Horizont gewaltig."
languages.original_text: "It pains me to say this, but I believe visiting Thassera was beneficial for you. Such experiences... greatly expand one's horizons."

traits.locale_text: "Es schmerzt mich, das zu sagen, doch ich glaube, der Besuch auf Thassera war gut für Euch. Solche Erfahrungen ... erweitern den Horizont gewaltig."

languages.text: « Cela me navre de vous le dire, mais je pense que cette visite de Thassera vous a été bénéfique. De telles expériences... élargissent nos horizons. »
languages.original_text: "It pains me to say this, but I believe visiting Thassera was beneficial for you. Such experiences... greatly expand one's horizons."

traits.locale_text: « Cela me navre de vous le dire, mais je pense que cette visite de Thassera vous a été bénéfique. De telles expériences... élargissent nos horizons. »

languages.text: «Me aflige decirlo, pero creo que visitar Thassera ha sido beneficioso para usted. Esta clase de experiencias... contribuyen a ampliar los propios horizontes».
languages.original_text: "It pains me to say this, but I believe visiting Thassera was beneficial for you. Such experiences... greatly expand one's horizons."

traits.locale_text: «Me aflige decirlo, pero creo que visitar Thassera ha sido beneficioso para usted. Esta clase de experiencias... contribuyen a ampliar los propios horizontes».

languages.text: “虽然我很不愿意这么说，但我相信，造访塔瑟拉的经历对你是有益的。这样的经历……可以极大地拓展一个人的视野。”
languages.original_text: "It pains me to say this, but I believe visiting Thassera was beneficial for you. Such experiences... greatly expand one's horizons."

traits.locale_text: “虽然我很不愿意这么说，但我相信，造访塔瑟拉的经历对你是有益的。这样的经历……可以极大地拓展一个人的视野。”

languages.text: "Bunu söylediğime üzülüyorum ama Thassera'yı görmek sana yaradı. Bu tür tecrübeler, insanın ufkunu açar."
languages.original_text: "It pains me to say this, but I believe visiting Thassera was beneficial for you. Such experiences... greatly expand one's horizons."
